faq.question: What types of proposals does it support?
faq.answer: All formats: RFP responses, vendor proposals, service agreements, consulting bids, project quotes, and more.

faq.question: Can it compare multiple proposals?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support side-by-side proposal comparison with standardized metrics.

faq.question: Does it extract total cost accurately?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI identifies all costs including one-time fees, recurring charges, and optional add-ons.

faq.question: Can it flag risky or unusual terms?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI flags clauses that deviate from standard business terms, including unusual payment terms and liability limitations.

faq.question: What's included in the Team plan?
faq.answer: Team plans include unlimited proposals, shared workspaces for procurement teams, and admin controls.
